entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SuppliedDescription
entry.value: Units recover more quickly while adjacent to a Trojan.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SuppliedFlavor
entry.value: Guardsmen clamored about the Trojan, eagerly pushing past each other to be the first to get a fresh plate of slop. Quartermasters rifle through the spare parts and ammunition, nabbing any useful bits for repairs and rearmament.
